title: (x) Desperate for this font ID / 'Heard&Seen': thin grotesque - Helvetica Neue Ultra Light {Rainer}
content:
Everyone please help, I've been looking for this font ID for a year until I found this forum.

Already tried MyFonts WTF but result is not accurate. It showed Houschka alt thin which is only a similarity at some part.

Thanks a lot!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202005940im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fonts_5209.JPG)
author: kelvint

comments.content: goodness, yes yes yes yes this is the one!! thanks Renko!!

My first impression was another helvetica variant, Helios Thin (or ultra thin depending on the house)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202005940im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HeardSeen_5435.jpg)
  
(Screenshot from [http://www.paratype.ru/pstore/fonts/Helios.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202005940/http:/www.paratype.ru/pstore/fonts/Helios.htm "http://www.paratype.ru/pstore/fonts/Helios.htm"))

I agree Helvetica Neue Ultra Light would be a good guess too.

--Kelsey
